name: Dataland
long_description: Dataland is a high-performance data tool that's designed specifically for non-technical frontline teams. Dataland unifies data from across the business and allows frontline teams to Search, Analyze, and Ask AI to quickly get the answers they need against one unified source of truth. Frontline teams - working in customer support, sales, fulfillment, operations, and logistics - get data workflows done 10x faster by using a single integrated tool that's designed to be fast and easy to use.
one_liner: The Fast Data Tool for Frontline Teams
